avatar_desc: This plugin provides an avatar system that can be used by other plugins.
avatar-notsquare: The uploaded image is not square
avatar-toosmall: The uploaded image is too small
avatar-toolarge: The uploaded image is too large
uploadavatar-notice:
'''Note:''' After saving, you may have to bypass your browser's cache to see the changes.
* '''Firefox/Safari:''' Hold Shift while clicking Reload, or press either Ctrl-F5 or Ctrl-R (⌘-R on a Mac)
* '''Google Chrome:''' Press Ctrl-Shift-R (⌘-Shift-R on a Mac)
* '''Internet Explorer:''' Hold Ctrl while clicking Refresh, or press Ctrl-F5
* '''Opera:''' Go to Menu → Settings (Opera → Preferences on a Mac) and then to Privacy & security → Clear browsing data → Cached images and files.
uploadavatar-hint: You can resize the cropper or move it to crop your avatar.
log-description-avatar: This page shows avatar upload and management activities.
